  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init()
      Reset values and UI to be in their default state.

    • updateMoney

      public void updateMoney()
      Increase money by chosen amount once order has been submitted. If the money has been doubled, this is reset for later additions.

    • getMoney

      public Money getMoney()

    • updateChefUI

      public void updateChefUI(Chef chef)
      Show the image of the currently selected chef as well as have the stack of ingredients currently held by the chef.
      Parameters:
      chef - The chef that is currently selected for which to show the UI.

    • finishGameUI

      public void finishGameUI(String outcome)
      End game and output the appropriate label stating the player's result. Everything on the UI is cleared but the home button.
      Parameters:
      outcome - The result of the game, either "win" or "lose".

    • updateRecipeUI

      public void updateRecipeUI(ArrayList<Recipe> recipes, ArrayList<com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.ProgressBar> progressBars)
      Show the current requested recipe that the player needs to make, the ingredients for that, and the number of remaining recipes.
      Parameters:
      recipes - The recipes to display.
      progressBars - The order waiting times to display.

    • isGameFinished

      public boolean isGameFinished()
